context: Regional insurance company expanding into parametric products to address climate change risks and provide faster claims settlement

request.purpose: Develop and launch parametric flood insurance product using satellite data and weather indices for automated payouts
request.justification: Meet growing demand for climate-resilient insurance solutions and differentiate from traditional indemnity products

activities: Limited market launch in high-risk areas

business_impact.expected_outcome: 30% faster claims settlement and 25% reduction in operational costs
business_impact.projected_value: $15,000,000 in new premium revenue over 3 years

lessons_learned: Early stakeholder engagement essential for successful adoption, robust technology infrastructure critical for reliability
